name: Be in the Heart of Boston
neighborhood_overview: Great city located within steps of high end restaurants as well as quick eats. Tons of shops within a few minutes on Newbury Street and Boylston Street as well as Shops at Prudential Center. Zip Car onsite as well as Hubway bike share.
description:
